content: Moonnaam shushroosha
Praarththhana

Karunayulllla daivamaaya kartthaave! Ninnil nyangall abhayampraapichukondu ninte karthrkalpanaprakaaram nidrapraapichirikkunna ee aathmaavinuvendi apekshikkunnu. Kartthaave! Dushdanmaaraaya mathsarakkaarude valakallilninnum adrshyamaaya andhakaarasenakallilninnum ivane samrakshichu neethimaanmaarude koottatthil rakshaasthhaanatthu chennucheruvaanum ninte vishuddhanmaarodorumichu ennennekkum vasikkuvaanum ivanu samgathiyaakkaname. Hosho..
(kukkiliyon)

Samrakshakanaam naathhaa! Devaa-haale...U haale...
Raavum pakalum thirumu-mpil kenen.

Pookatten praarththhana nin savidham-haale...U haale...
Shraddhicheedanamen-yaachanaye.

Thinmaye mohichennaathmam-haale...U haale...
Ennuyir paathaa-llam pooki.

Kuzhiyil pettore-ppolaayen-haale...U haale...
Thunayattoro-dotthen nyaan.
Baarekmor. Shubaho... Menaolam...
(ekbo-yaummaano)

Mrthiyaarnnore!-saubhaagyam
Ningallkkuththhaana-tthin naallil
Ullkkondoruyirin thirumeyyum
Mochanamekum thirurakthamathum
Ningalle nirttheedum-valabhaage.
Saumenkaalos

items.content: Marichavare jeevippikkunnavanum kabaradakkappettavare ezhunnelpikkunnavanum nyaayaadhipathimaarude nyaayaa dhipathiyumaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thante daasante shavasamskkaarashushroosha nirvahikkappedunna ee samaya tthum........ Thanne naam ortthu mahathvappedutthanam. Bkulhoon........

Aadiyil undaayirunnavanum, ippoll ullllavanum, ennennekkum nilanilkkunnavanum, thante pithaavinte mahathvatthil vishuddhamaalaakhamaarodukoode varuvaanirikkunnavanumaaya mashihaa thampuraane! Samkhyaatheethamaaya nirakallum ganangallum pathinaayirangallum thirumumpaake paribhramichu virachukondu nilkkunnu. Bhayangkaranmaaraaya kobenmaarum sthhirathayulllla ganangallum svargeeyamaaya meghangallil ninne aaghoshikkunnu. Ninte ugramaaya shabdatthil nee attahasikkumpoll maranam veenupovukayum paathaallam nashichupovukayum aadibhoothangall azhinyupovukayum, bhoomiyil dravichu chernnupoya sarvvashareerangallum punaraayi srshdikkappedukayum cheyyunnu. Sakalatthinteyum srashdaavum nirmmithaavumenna nilayil srshdishakthiyulllla vachanatthaal nee veendum avaye sajeekarikkunnu. Nanmayaakatte thinmayaakatte avanavan pravartthichittullllavayekkurichu samaadhaanam bodhippikkuvaanaayi sakalavamshangallum gothrangallum paribhramajanakavum bhayangkaravumaaya ninte simhaasanatthin mumpaake vannukoodukayum cheyyunnu. Balavaanum kaarunyavaanumaaya daivamaaya kartthaave! Ivayellaam sambhavikkukayum pravartthikkappedukayum cheyyunnathaaya aa samayatthu ninnilulllla prathyaashayode nidrapraapichirikkunna ee sahodarane ninte valatthubhaagatthu nirutthikkollllaname. "ente shareeram bhakshikkukayum ente raktham paanam cheyyukayum ennil vishvasikkukayum cheyyunna evanum ennilum nyaan avanilum vasikkunnu. Avasaanadivasatthil nyaan avane uyirtthezhunnelpikkum” ennu jeevanulllla thiruvaaykondu arullicheythittullllathaaya aa vachanam nyangallilum ivanilum niravettaname. Nyangallum nyangallude paretharum ninte valatthubhaagatthu ninnukondu ninte karunaye kaanukayum ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddhaathmaavinum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettukayum cheyyumaaraaka .

Paulosezhuthi-mrthi mishihaayil praa-
Pichore-maranam-baadhikki-llennevam
Mishihaanidraa-vasharaayor veendum
Mrthiyelkki-llennul-ghoshichaan-shaasthreeshan.

Balavaanum mahaakaarunyavaanum dayaaluvumaaya daivamaaya kartthaave! Thirusannidhiyilekku nee edutthirikkunnathinaal nidrapraapichirikkunna ee sahodaranuvendi ee samayatthu nyangall anachirikkunna ee dhoopam kaikkondu svargeeya oorshlemil mohaneeya vaasasthhaanangallil ivane aashvasippikkukayum kadangallude parihaaratthinum paapangallude mochanatthinum thirumumpaakeyulllla mukhaprasannathaykkum ivane arhanaakkukayum cheyyaname. Moraan vaalohaan…

content: (kolo-kukkoyo)

Nukarunnonu kadum kaypaa-nee maranakkaa-saa
Varika javam pokaamudayon-ninne aaraa-yu-
/tnnennaathmaavo-daa doothan chollum
/tneram paaram-ghoram khedakaram.
Kanneer kavillilozhukkikko-ndaathmaavothu-nnu:
Shaantiyoduththhaanatthollam-thanuve! Nivasi-kka.
/thaale... U haale...

Nyaan vaideshikanennevam-chonneedunnaathmam
Aall veettudayon vittathinaal nilppaan tharamilla.
/tpreshithanenno-devam bhaashichu:
/taalayavaasam-kaivediyuka, varika
Kartthaavarulliya naall vareyum-nyaan meviyathaa-kum
Mohana nashvaramandirame-vaazhka shubham me-yye.
/thaale...U haale...
Baarekmor. Shubaho ...

Daivasuthaa! Vazhiyaathrayilen-paathheyam nee-yaam
Jagatheeposhakane! Pashiyil-neeyenne po-tti.
/tnyaaneriyaruthe-nin thanurudhirangall
/ten thanuveennum-vaasana veeshumpoll.
Maamoodeesa enikkortthaal-mungaatthoru nau-ka
Naathhaa! Nin krpa kaananame-nyaanuththhaana-tthil.
/thaale... U haale....
Menaolam ...

Verpaadin vellayilaathmam-meyyodura che-yyu-
Nnentupakaaramenikkekum-dhanasampaadya-ngall?
/tvidhinilayatthil-chodikkum sukrtham
/tcheythennaakil-phalamullavaayene.
Vaasasthhalavum dhanavum nyaanudamasthharkke-ki
Bheekarasimhaasanasavidham-pokunnene-nte
Haale.... Cheythikallariyippaan.
Moriyo ...
(maar apreminte bovuso)

Aardrathayaal naathhaa devaa!
Daasannekaname-punyam
Nin mahimodayanaall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaa-yivane.

Rakshippaan vannon mashihaa!
Neeyen sangketham-mithram.
Chaavirullil paathaallatthil
Nin sleebaa+yaanan-deepam.

En verpaadaasannam nyaan
Ningallil ninnippo-ll neengum.
Verpaadekiya daivatthe
Ortthenne orppin-ningall.

Vathsalare! Shaantyaa vaazh/u200bvin
Thaathanmaare! Praarththhippin
Nyaanippoll Daivam chollum
Sthhaanam nokkippo-kunnu.

Elkkuka devaa! Nin sharane
Nidrayilaayoraa-thmatthe
Nin krpa shobhikkum naallil
Nirtthaname valamaa-yivane.

Aardrathayaal naathhaa! Devaa!
Daasannekaname-punyam
Nin mahimodayanaall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaa-yivane.
( antya chumbanam nalkukayaanengkil upayogikkaanulllla geetham)

Vathsalare doora-tthentinu nilkkunnen
Arikil varin, shlomo tharuvin, praarththhichiduvin.
Sangkada keertthanamen-perkkaayu paadiduvin
Mrthi paathaallakavaadatthil bandhichenne.

Maranatthin doothan-pirake vannappoll
Chuttum paartthen thuna chey/u200bvaan vannillaarum
Villi koottunnorkkaay-vellivaakum naathhaa!
Nin daivikamaam valabhaage nirtthanamenne.

Vathsalare sathyam bhayamaarnneedunnen
Kadhinabhayatthaalennakathaarillakeedunnu.
Jagatheerakshakanaam-mashihaa nrpanen per-
Kkaall vittathinaal pokunnen sangkadapoorvvam.

Bhuvananivaasikalle! Shubhamodu vaaneeduvin
Lokamayanmaarkkilla gunam kaalam moolam.
Pokunnen nalkaan-ente kanakkellaam
Sarvvarahasyavidheeshan than thirusannidhiyil

Vairoopyam sumukhar-kkekum mrthiye nee
Snehithanodu modippone khedippikkum.
Vannini nin bharanam-neekki duഃkhithare
Svaprabhayaal modippikkum naathhan dhanyan.

Paazhoozhiyiluyarum-shooshaanappookkall
Vasthram kaippaniyallaatthathu chaarttheedum pol
Aadaam makkallkkaay-roohkkudishaa neytha
Vasthramuyirppil chaarttheedum punyaathmaakkall.
